DOC.brief_summary: Sphenopalatine ganglion ( SPG ) -acupuncture show exhibit distinct effect treatment nasal inflammatory disease , mechanism remain largely unknown . Investigators aim assess effect SPG acupuncture nasal ventilation function autonomic nervous system health volunteer . The randomized , double-blind , control clinical trial enrol healthy volunteers.Healthy subject randomly assign either active SPG-acupuncture group sham-acupuncture group . All subject assess self-reported nasal ventilation , nasal patency ( nasal airway resistance ( NAR ) nasal cavity volume ( NVC ) ) , exhale nasal nitric oxide ( nNO ) acupuncture . Meanwhile , order explore underlying mechanism SPG acupuncture , change neuropeptides ( substance P ( SP ) , vasoactive intestinal peptide ( VIP ) neuropeptide Y ( NPY ) ) nasal secretion investigate baseline , 30 minute , 2 hour , 24 hour acupuncture .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Sphenopalatine Ganglion Acupuncture Nasal Function
DOC.criteria: nonsmoking volunteer without history nasal disease ( allergic rhinitis , sinusitis , nasal polyp , nasal septum deviation history nose surgery ) lung disease ( asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease fibrosis ) free upper low respiratory tract infection least 4 week begin study . negative skin prick test allergy receive acupuncture within last four week start study history diabetes mellitus , autonomic neuropathy , coronary heart disease hypertension .
